text: @WhiteHouse @FLOTUS @NIH 74,347 Americans are DEAD of the coronavirus as of 7:01 am May 7 due to her husband’s genocidal incompetence and this is the #BeBest gesture the Third Lady can do? Lame. https://t.co/FHpwhZUI0T
